name: Out Of Controls (Fluffy_The_Cat)
description:
Every time the timer hits 60 all the controlls change.

The speedrun timer shows time when you beat the game

Thanks to Google Transelate for voice acting 

Controls:

W, A, S,  D and Up, Down, Right, Left

Programs:

Audacity

Paint 3D
